sentences.sContent: ‘I’m a prisoner in my own home.’ ‘Nonsense!’
sentences.sCn: “我在自己家里就像个囚犯。”“胡说！”

sentences.sContent: If you ask me, these modern teaching methods are a load of nonsense (= a lot of nonsense ).
sentences.sCn: 要我说，这些现代教学方法全是一派胡言。

sentences.sContent: He was talking utter nonsense as usual.
sentences.sCn: 他像平常一样又在胡说八道了。

sentences.sContent: By 1832 the idea had become an economic nonsense.
sentences.sCn: 到了1832年，那种观点已经成为经济学的谬论。

remMethod.val: non(不) + sense(意义) → 无意义的话 → 废话

trans.tranCn: 胡说， 废话； 冒失的行为
trans.tranOther: ideas, opinions, statements etc that are not true or that seem very stupid
